title: 208: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 9 (Wait, WTF, She LIKES Him?!)
itunes:title: 208: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 9 (Wait, WTF, She LIKES Him?!)
description:
(TRIGGER WARNING: Disordered eating discussed at (00:56:30 - 00:59:30) and suicide discussed at (01:10:00 - 01:13:30)...the entire recap of Ben and Tayshia's conversation lasts from approximately 01:01:30 - 01:13:30) The Broads are back for a recap of Bachelorette episode 9 and it is the week before “Hometowns”! But call The Broads confused because this week is throwing them for a loop. First they discuss a bit of Bach Tea & Theory and then they dive into the “to be continued” Noah VS Bennett show down. They chat about Tayshia’s response to Bennett, Bennett continuing to creep, and Noah’s smirk. They also discuss Ben’s one-on-one date as he continues to be vulnerable, the lie detector test date that was not run but a professional, Tayshia’s questions thereafter, our love for Riley growing, and much more. 

***Join The Broads Friday December 11th for a special “Ask Us Anything” episode where they get wild and answer A LOT of personal questions they’ve never discussed about sex, Bachelor threesomes switching partners, what they fight about, etc! 


NATIONAL SUICIDE PREVENTION LIFELINE: https://suicidepreventionlifeline.org/
